title: 067 - Bill Reaches His Boiling Point
description: On today's show, the guys discuss pool building magnate Lucas Lagoons after watching an episode of the show earlier in the day. They also go through a few #PodFacts and a new nickname has finally pushed Big Motor over the edge and he's had enough of it. The guys also look at the Emmy nominations and cover several other things in the Pod FOD. Don't forget to send in your questions to @ThePodPMI on Twitter and Instagram, and if you're not already, make sure you subscribe to youtube.com/thepatmcafeeshow for more content. We appreciate you for listening. Enjoy.
